metadata.Title: CVE-2011-0740 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability inmagpie/scripts/magpie_slashbox.php in RSS Feed Reader 0.1 for WordPressallows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via therss_url parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-0740` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-magpierss - 0.72-10ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: magpierss package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.72-10ubuntu1').
